Let me try again. How can I edit my USER enviromental valuables?
for a specific command you just prefix the variable identifier and it's value to the command itself, example: SOMETHING=VALUE ls
this will run the 'ls' command with the value for the environment variable SOMETHING equal to VALUE
to permanently  set  the value, edit ~/.profile
